mapper.insert:
select NVL(max(iata_key), 0) + 1 from iata_code
INSERT IGNORE INTO iata_code (iata_key, iata_code, city, city_ko, country, country_ko) VALUES (#{iata_key}, #{iataCode}, #{city},#{cityKo}, #{country}, #{countryKo})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM iata_code WHERE iata_code = #{iataCode} LIMIT 1
